name: The omnigun
description:
Aliens came in your farm.

To save the world you found the only weapon that can beat them, the omnigun.

However each time you hit a living being with it its effects change.

It's up to you to find a way to beat the extra-terrestrials and not reinforce them.

Credits and tools:

Game made with Unity

3D models with blender

https://www.leshylabs.com/apps/sfMaker/ to create the sound effects

I used the exo expanded font by Natanael Gama

https://www.1001freefonts.com/exo-expanded.font
